entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COLDER WITH LOWS AROUND 8 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 3 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 17
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW IN THE MORNING

CLEAR, COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 9 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE LOWER 50S AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE LOWER 40S AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
